entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
